Package database

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
database.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
Provides functionalities for managing database operations related to Users and Persons. It encapsulates the logic for connecting to the database, as well as adding, updating, selecting, and deleting Users and Persons from the database. This manager uses a properties file (database_credentials.properties) for retrieving database connection details such as URL, username, and password.
Author:
Leuti Michele

  • Method Details

    • getConnection

      public static Connection getConnection() throws SQLException
      Establishes a connection to the database using credentials obtained from the properties file.
      Returns:
      Connection to the database
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the url is null

    • insertUser

      public static void insertUser(User user)
      Inserts a new user into the database. Before insertion, it checks if the username already exists to prevent duplicates.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be inserted into the database.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the username already exists in the database.
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL statement is incorrect.

    • deleteUser

      public static void deleteUser(User user)
      Deletes a user and all associated persons from the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be deleted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL statement is incorrect.

    • selectUserByUsername

      public static User selectUserByUsername(String username)
      Selects a user by username from the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to be selected.
      Returns:
      User object if the user exists, null otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL statement is incorrect.

    • selectPersonById

      public static Person selectPersonById(String id, User user)
      Retrieves a person by their ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the person to retrieve.
      user - The user associated with the person. This is used to establish relational context.
      Returns:
      The Person object if found, null otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL statement is incorrect.

    • insertPerson

      public static void insertPerson(Person person, User u)
      Inserts a new person into the database and associates it with a user.
      Parameters:
      person - The person to insert into the database.
      u - The user to associate with the person.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL statement is incorrect.

    • deletePerson

      public static void deletePerson(Person person, User u)
      Deletes a person from the database based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      person - The person to delete.
      u - The user associated with the person. This parameter is used to update the user's local data.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL statement is incorrect.

    • selectAllPersonsByUserId

      public static ArrayList<Person> selectAllPersonsByUserId(User user)
      Selects all persons associated with a given user from the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose associated persons are to be selected.
      Returns:
      A list of Person objects associated with the user.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL statement is incorrect.

    • updatePerson

      public static void updatePerson(Person person, User user)
      Updates the details of an existing person in the database.
      Parameters:
      person - The person with updated details.
      user - The user associated with the person. This parameter is used to update the user's local data.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL statement is incorrect.

    • updateUser

      public static void updateUser(User user)
      Updates the details of an existing user in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user with updated details.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL statement is incorrect.

    • doesUsernameExist

      public static boolean doesUsernameExist(String username)
      Checks if a username already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check.
      Returns:
      true if the username exists, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL statement is incorrect.

    • searchPersons

      public static ArrayList<Person> searchPersons(String input, User user)
      Searches for persons in the database based on a given input string, which can be a name or surname. This method allows for partial matches.
      Parameters:
      input - The input string to match against person names or surnames.
      user - The user context for the search. Only persons associated with this user are considered.
      Returns:
      A list of persons that match the search criteria.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL statement is incorrect.
